feed.title: TallinnSec
feed.subtitle: TallinnSec is a nonprofit organization of information security professionals, practitioners and enthusiasts. We organize various meetups/events.

entry.title: You can follow up on us!

link.title: You can follow up on us!

entry.content:
As TallinnSec is restarting with the event series, it is important to keep up with us on social media not to miss anything.

Check us out in: Twitter, Facebook

or join our Slack channel: Slack
entry.summary: As TallinnSec is restarting with the event series, it is important to keep up with us on social media not to miss anything. Check us out in: Twitter, Facebook or join our Slack channel: Slack
